name: Retroburner
description:
You are the elite pilot of the Icarus 7 rocket. Your mission is to resupply Luna base and return the rocket safely to Terra. To get the highest score you must take advantage of orbital physics and conserve fuel.

Features

  • Realistic orbital physics;
  • Luna base is randomly positioned each game.

Controls

  • Left/right to yaw;
  • Up to fire thrusters.

This game was created as my February submission for the One Game a Month Game Jam. As a game jam game, it contains some bugs and is not as complete as I would have liked. But, if you like the game let me know in the comments below. If there is enough interest, I might be able to find the time to revisit this game and polish it off.
